Title: Three Into Two Won't Go
Actors: Rod Steiger, Claire Bloom, Judy Geeson, Peggy Ashcroft
Plot: Steve Howard, a British sales executive living in Manchester, England, begins an affair with a young hitchhiker, Elle Patterson, to emotionally get away from his marriage to his wife Francis. But when Elle moves into a room in Steve and Francis's house, he must keep the true nature of his relationship with Elle under wraps at all costs.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.
